Pro-Level Analysis with Zero Barriers

Pro level mechanic breakdowns with no wearables, no sensors and no labs.

Get a pro-grade analysis in minutes from a single phone video. No sensors, no multi-camera rigs, no gatekeepers. Our computer vision maps 1,000+ angles to surface sequence, posture, timing and more to give you the why behind your data.

Ask.

Your film finally has a

voice... and it talks

back.

Where am I losing power?
From the video, most of your power loss is happening during the transition from your load to your forward swing. Your hips start opening before your hands fully fire, which reduces the torque you can generate.
What should I work on next?
Your acceleration and change-of-direction scores are a bit below average. Let's focus on a faster first step out of your stance, cleaner plant angles on cuts, and quicker hip turns—try ladder work, the 5-10-5 shuttle, and resisted starts.
What’s my next focus?
Your tempo and face-to-path scores are slightly below average. Let's aim for a steadier 3:1 tempo and better face control—use metronome half-swings, alignment-stick drills, and slow-motion reps to groove consistency.

While They Wait, You’ll
Be Winning.

SportFX.ai was created with the mission to take sports performance analysis to the next level, combining motion tracking and body tracking technology with artificial intelligence to deliver precise, real-time metrics. From training sessions to technique evaluations, our platform detects and analyzes every movement, helping athletes, coaches, and sports enthusiasts improve their performance in a smart and measurable way. Our goal is to make training more effective, personalized, and motivating.
